item.title: Shiny Project
item.description: knitr::include_app("https://dustyturner.shinyapps.io/AdmissionsShiny/", height = "600px") # knitr::include_app("https://yihui.shinyapps.io/miniUI/", # height = "600px") % -- % -- % ## only want cadets who were accepted -- % ## change name of variable for ease of analysis -- % ## Select columns of interest -- % ## group to enable summaries -- % ## group to enable summaries -- % ## summaries total cadets -- here is where we need demographics data -- % ## ungroup for filter -- % ## filter the class year of interest -- % -- % ## Join with the state codes -- % -- % ## combine the NumericCode and District codes together -- % -- % -- % -- % -- % -- % -- % -- % -- % -- % -- % -- % --
